data.title: Stuart Glassman, MD
data.meta_description: Stuart Glassman, MD, is a member-at-large on the Specialty and Services Society Governing Council at the American Medical Association. Find Stuart Glassman's profile at the AMA.
data.text:
The AMA is committed to supporting efforts to reduce and prevent the rising rates of maternal mortality. Download the PDF with an overview of AMA recommendations to improve outcomes.

Internists help patients navigate many of the most common and consequential health issues. This is the guidance they most want to get across.

Measuring burnout comes first, but what comes next? That is what Marshfield Clinic Health System is learning by measuring with the AMA.

The AMA supports a proposed new cyber incident reporting rule, but emphasizes that health insurance companies must be subject to the same regulation.

A textbook published by the AMA lays out how to create a coaching program for graduate learners, as well as how to make it work long term.

Take a look at the crucial role of International Medical Graduates (IMGs) in our nation's health care landscape and how the AMA is working to support IMGs.

MSOP Outreach Leaders: Find all of the information you need for the year, including the leader guide PDF, event resources, templates and more.

Researching physician residency programs can be overwhelming. Get the answers on how M4s can make informed decisions about where to apply.

Not knowing the time requirements of a job can undermine your ability to provide quality care and lead to burnout. A recruiter outlines what to ask.

Whether you are looking for your first job out of residency or have been practicing for years, knowing how to negotiate your contract is vital.

New CMS guidance adds flexibility to ACO REACH Model reporting requirements and more in the latest National Advocacy Update.

The Aug. 27, 2024 Speakers' Update announces the opening of I-24 registration and the opening date of the online reference committees.

Apply for a leadership position by submitting the required documentation by the deadline.

Download PDFs of reports from the Council on Medical Education presented during the AMA Annual and Interim Meetings.

Find the agenda and more for the 2024 LGBTQ+ Section Interim Meeting on Nov. 8 at the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolphin Resort, Orlando, Florida.

Find the agenda, documents and more information for the 2024 OMSS Interim Meeting on Nov. 7-8 at the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolphin Resort, Orlando, Florida.

Find out how to apply for a seat on the CPT Editorial Panel or the CPT Advisory Committee.
